content: even if the weather outside is still a little too warm for actual snow you can bring the frosty fun inside with this adorable and slightly melted crochet snowman coaster pattern **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - white ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - black ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - warm brown ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - orange ▢5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us ** chains - chain magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet triple crochet - treble_crochet increase - increase
